item.description: Update #MainStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:30PM; 1120 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BLaY3L; #Downtown; Now 170 LAFD Firefighters actively assigned in the ongoing offensive firefight, primarily in the one story rear portion of the structure heavily involved in fire. item.description: Update #MainStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:05PM; 1120 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BLaY3L; #Downtown; With 123 LAFD Firefighters now actively assigned in an aggressive and well-coordinated offensive firefight, this incident has escalated to Major Emergency status. item.description: Update #MainStreetFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1526; 08:55PM; 1120 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BLaY3L; #Downtown; With 98 LAFD Firefighters assigned, this fire involving a combination 1 (rear portion) and 2 (front portion) story commercial building has escalated to Greater Alarm status and is formally known as the Main Street Fire.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E17 E203 E209 E210 E211 E227 E27 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA29 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1423; 07:38PM; 12367 N Jolette Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3h5O8uk; #GranadaHills; 26 LAFD firefighters took just 23 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames in the attic and first & second floor walls and eaves near the fireplace/chimney, of a 2,306 square-foot two-story home. Though there was a sudden structural failure of the chimney during the firefight, no injuries were reported. The specific cause of the fire is under investigation; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E87 RA18 RA70 T75 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1423; 07:15PM; 12367 N Jolette Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3h5O8uk; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: 2 story home with fire showing from the 2nd floor and attic; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 E287 E87 RA18 RA70 T75 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#1200; 04:43PM; San Gabriel Foothills; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pabcfP; Sylmar; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to 2 uninjured hikers stranded in rocky terrain east of May Canyon Truck Trail. A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter will hoist the two aboard and transfer them to a safe nearby landing zone.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 E298 E91 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA91 RH114 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0068; 01:14AM; 9738 N Beachy Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v8xzX0; Arleta; FIRE NOW OUT: 36 firefighters extinguished fire in a one story, single family dwelling in 29 mins. When firefighters arrived, fire was showing and had extended into the attic. One adult female patient was evaluated and declined LAFD treatment/transport. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E275 E289 E298 E7 E88 EM15 RA7 RA898 RA98 T75 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0279; 07:11AM; 5813 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v3EoJ8; Hollywood; The first responding firefighters achieved a knockdown in 13 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is updated to a two story and the fire appears to have started outside and extended in. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E226 E227 E235 E27 E52 E82 RA27 RA827 T26 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
